name: Super Mario E3 Video
description: Super Mario for Nintendo 3DS is an all new game that combines classic Mario game play and 3D visuals in a truly amazing way. Itâ€™s the return of the Tanooki Mario! Tanooki Mario has a tail that allows him to hover jump easily from platform to platform or even take out enemies with a quick whip of the tail. Players of all skill levels will enjoy playing the game.
